data.text: Gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba, God men arazir kuram mengvɨra ikian koghtɨ,
O God, kɨ uan arazir kurabar gun nɨ mɨkemezir puvatɨgha,
Dɨmagariba ko arueba, nɨ ivezir kuram na ganɨngizɨ
Datɨrɨghɨn kɨ uan arazir kuraba bar dar gun Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨkemezɨ,
Kamaghɨn dera, nɨn gumazamiziba osɨmtɨziba bativ,
Nɨ hoziaba ko donkibar mɨn onganan markɨ,
Gumazir arazir kurabagh amiba osɨmtɨzir avɨriba bativam.
